title: How MVC is important
description: It combines all of the strategies we've learned thus far. The Model (collecting the data; back-end), the View (what the user sees and interacts with; front-end), and the Controller (the connection between Model and View; middleware).

title: What ORM stands for
description: ORM means Object-Relational Mapping. It helps us create and connect to a database much easier using Sequelize.
